data.title: How to Watch The Boy and the Heron
data.meta_description: You can now watch the film online.
data.text:
The Boy and the Heron, the latest (and perhaps not the last) feature film from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki and the animation gurus at Studio Ghibli, received expectedly great reviews for its debut in North America. IGN's The Boy and the Heron review awarded it a 9 out of 10, calling it "Studio Ghibli's most visually complex film to date" and the "most emotionally raw Miyazaki has ever gotten."

If you're wondering how and where to watch The Boy and the Heron in 2024, take a look at the info below.

The Boy and the Heron Streaming Online

The Boy and the Heron is currently available to purchase digitally on Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV+, Prime Video, and Vudu for $19.99. The latest Miyazaki film is currently not available as part of any streaming subscription services. Despite this, it's worth noting that all but one of Studio Ghibli's previous films (Grave of the Fireflies) are streaming on Max. We'll update this with new information as it becomes available.

The Boy and the Heron 4K UHD and Blu-ray Is now Available

On July 9, 2024 The Boy and the Heron Blu-ray and limited-edition steelbooks became available to the public. You can currently purchase a copy of either via Amazon and various other onlie retailers. Amazon is also having a sale on other Studio Ghibli movies alongside the release of the film.

What Is The Boy and the Heron About?

Loading

Play

The Boy and the Heron is acclaimed filmmaker Hayao Miyazaki's first feature film in 10 years. Here's the official plot "introduction" from Studio Ghibli:

A young boy named Mahito yearning for his mother ventures into a world shared by the living and the dead. There, death comes to an end, and life finds a new beginning. A semi-autobiographical fantasy about life, death, and creation, in tribute to friendship, from the mind of Hayao Miyazaki.

How to Watch Previous Studio Ghibli Movies

Every Studio Ghibli movie, excluding Grave of the Fireflies, is available to stream on Max. Grave of the Fireflies, unfortunately, cannot currently be found to rent or buy on any digital platform:

The Boy and the Heron Voice Cast

The Boy and the Heron was written and directed by Hayao Miyazaki. It stars the following actors:

Christian Bale as Shoichi Maki

Dave Bautista as The Parakeet King

Gemma Chan as Natsuko

Willem Dafoe as Noble Pelican

Karen Fukuhara as Lady Himi

Mark Hamill as Granduncle

Robert Pattinson as Gray Heron

Florence Pugh as Kiriko

Japanese Voice Cast

Takuya Kimura as Shoichi Maki

Jun Kunimura as The Parakeet King

Yoshino Kimura as Natsuko

Kaoru Kobayashi as Noble Pelican

AIMYON as Lady Himi

Shohei Hino as Granduncle

Masaki Suda as Gray Heron

Ko Shibasaki as Kiriko

The Boy and the Heron Rating and Runtime

The Boy and the Heron is Rated PG-13 for some violent content/bloody images and smoking. The film runs for a total of 2 hours and 4 minutes including credits.

Jordan covers games, shows, and movies as a freelance writer for IGN.
